title: Sheets
short_description: A Google-Sheets-driven template designed for loading collection metadata directly from a CSV
description: The SHEETS template enables live collaboration to prototype collections with minimal set up and unique learning experiences. Build and share collections generated directly from a Google Sheet, a local CSV, or an external (hosted) CSV.
points: Focus on the spreadsheet with live updates as metadata changes; Great for records-only sites; Minimal repository work; Same great CollectionBuilder framework.

title: GitHub Pages
short_description: A lightweight, learning-focused template designed for free hosting on GitHub Pages
description: This is a great option for learning, teaching, quick prototyping, or just testing! A complete collection can be built entirely via the GitHub web interface.
points: Classroom Projects;One-off Collections;Learning about Git, Static Web Technologies, web development and design;Data transformation

title: CSV
short_description: Our most robust and flexible template designed for developing exhibits on your local computer
description: CSV is our most robust, flexible, and customizable template, allowing users to efficiently develop collections via their local computer and serving them from anywhere!
points: Flexible object locations and representations;Designed for easier customization and creating new visualizations;Fully self-contained projects;Focus on metadata and curate items from anywhere
